list.title: SIZES_TO_WEDGES
list.description: How many lime wedges that can be obtained based on its size.

list.title: limesToCut
list.description: Calculates the number of limes that need to be cut to reach a certain supply.

list.title: remainingOrders
list.description: Determines which juices still need to be prepared after the end of the shift.

list.title: timeToMixJuice
list.description: Determines how long it takes to prepare a certain juice.
